properties.description: Sets spacers to the content section.              Values: true, false              Default: true
properties.name: defaultStyle

properties.description: Contextmenu name that associates it with trigger component
properties.name: name

methods.description: Check if contextmenu is going to exceed window limits
methods.name: _exceedsWindow

methods.description: Relocates contextmenu correctly without exceed window limits
methods.name: _relocateContextmenu

params.description: Position X of mouse event click
params.name: posX

params.description: Position Y of mouse event click
params.name: posY

params.description: Side where contextmenu exceed window limits
params.name: exceedsObject

methods.description: Creates the listeners of the overlay
methods.name: _setOverlayListeners

methods.description: Sets up declarative user contextmenu items
methods.name: _setupItems

methods.description: Creates the overlay and all the events for its optimal cross browser performance
methods.name: _setupOverlay

methods.description: Sets up span with name of app
methods.name: _setupSpan

methods.description: Checks if there is already a contextmenu open and close it
methods.name: _verifyOpenContextmenu

params.description: Stores the node of open contextmenu
params.name: openContextmenu

methods.description: Adds new contextmenu node item programmatically
methods.name: addItem

methods.description: Adds a new contextmenu trigger node

methods.description: Removes node item passed as parameter

methods.description: Replaces old node item with a new one

params.description: Position X of mouse event click
params.name: posX
